entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
